body_html:
@aselle We already allow section 2 item 6 case in the current implementation. The only issue here is that the current op expect a tensor of records, each of which is a record.

You will need to either preprocess the csv to generate the tensor of records or have a new op that takes the whole file and process on the fly. It is better to just convert it directly instead of composing tensor of records and do another traversal of it in this op.

body:
@aselle We already allow section 2 item 6 case in the current implementation. The only issue here is that the current op expect a tensor of records, each of which is a record. 

You will need to either preprocess the csv to generate the tensor of records or have a new op that takes the whole file and process on the fly. It is better to just convert it directly instead of composing tensor of records and do another traversal of it in this op.
